summary: Filmmaker Louis Schwartzberg hits the road to capture America's people and its natural beauty.
cast: George Woodard|Charles Jimmie Sr.|The Vasquez Brothers|Frank Pino|David Pino|John 'Yac' Yacobellis|Patty Wagstaff|Paul Stone|Ed Holt|Weirton Steelworkers|Cecil Williams|Janice Miriktani|David Krakauer|James Andrews|Trombone Shorty|Marc Savoy|Ann Savoy|Daniel Klennert|Art Car Festival|Michael Bennett|Erik Weihenmayer|Mosie Burks|Ace Barnes|James Tuppin|Ben Cohen|Minny Yancy|Roudy Roudebush|Rick Hoyt|Dick Hoyt|Amelia Rudolph|Harrod Blank
title: El cuerpo y el espíritu de América
